Package qemujuicy

Class Msg

  • java.lang.Object
    • qemujuicy.Msg
  • public class Msg
extends Object
    Msg (short for Message): a utility to provide strings/messages for other languages. At the beginning, messages are hard coded and may be replaced later by database text or a resources bundle, containing other messages of other languages. This approach is a simple message system for an easy startup with the ability to extend it later for other languages (just store another EnumMap in the class Message of the other language). Msg is always combined with the enumeration class Message, containing the tags and their string values.
    See Also:
    Message
